oai_dc:dc.dc:title: SUBMERGED BREAKWATERS FOR THE DEFENCE OF THE SHORELINE AT OSTIA FIELD EXPERIENCES, COMPARISON
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tomasicchio, Ugo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: breakwater
submerged breakwater
shoreline defense
Ostia
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An important study case with different defence structures and the results of the monitoring data of are reported. Field experiences are specially usefull to compare two soft structures used to defend the Lido of Ostia, i. e. the coastline of Rome at the mouth of river Tevere (Tiber).
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 25 (1996): Proceedings of 25th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Orlando, Florida, 1996.
